channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court rejects call to overturn its decision legalizing same-sex marriage nationwide
item.description: The justices, without comment, turned away an appeal from Kim Davis, the former Kentucky court clerk who refused to issue marriage licenses to same-se...

item.title: The Efficiency Trap: How AI’s Dark Enlightenment Is Rewriting Reality
item.description: The Dark Enlightenment of AI has turned efficiency into ideology. Here’s how it’s reshaping brands, leadership, and the future of truth.

item.title: 5 New Movies To Watch This Week On Netflix, HBO Max, Prime Video And More
item.description: Looking for some good movies to watch this week? Here are five great options new to streaming on Netflix and other top streaming platforms.

item.title: Hyundai Data Breach Exposes 2.7 Million Social Security Numbers
item.description: Hyundai is alerting millions of customers about a data breach that exposed Social Security numbers and driver's licenses.

item.title: Trump's 50-year mortgage proposal: What would it mean for homebuyers?

item.title: Trump’s $2,000 tariff ‘dividends’ would cost twice as much as the revenue coming in, budget watchdog warns
item.description: “If tariff dividends are paid annually, deficits would increase by $6 trillion over ten years,” per the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget.

item.title: Grok: Least Empathetic, Most Dangerous AI For Vulnerable People, Study Says

item.title: Wendy’s plans hundreds of store closures to boost profits
item.description: The company said it expected a “mid-single-digit percentage” of its U.S. stores to be affected, but it didn't give any more details.

item.title: AI stocks lead Wall Street rebound as Nvidia, Palantir surge and S&P 500 claws back last week’s losses

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
